Package com.intellij.application.options.editor

Interface EditorOptionsProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configurable, SearchableConfigurable, UnnamedConfigurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoImportOptionsConfigurable, CodeCompletionOptions, CodeFoldingConfigurable, ColorAndFontOptions, PostfixTemplatesConfigurable

    public interface EditorOptionsProvider
extends SearchableConfigurable
    Register implementation of this interface in the plugin.xml to provide sub-section of Editor section in the Settings dialog:

    <extensions defaultExtensionNs="com.intellij">
      <editorOptionsProvider instance="class-name"/>
    </extensions>

    A new instance of the specified class will be created each time then the Settings dialog is opened

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.options.SearchableConfigurable

        SearchableConfigurable.Delegate, SearchableConfigurable.Merged, SearchableConfigurable.Parent

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.options.Configurable

        Configurable.Composite, Configurable.NoMargin, Configurable.NoScroll, Configurable.TopComponentController, Configurable.TopComponentProvider, Configurable.VariableProjectAppLevel, Configurable.WithEpDependencies

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.options.Configurable

        APPLICATION_CONFIGURABLE, PROJECT_CONFIGURABLE

    • Method Summary
